content: this is a super simple 2x2 ribbed in the round hat designed to practice getting comfortable with knits and purls materials needed - 1 skein of a 100g worsted weight yarn - us 8/5 00mm 16 circular needles - us 8/5 00mm double pointed needles - stitch markers - tapestry needles to weave in ends skills used - 2x2 ribbing - knitting in the round - k2tog and ssk decreases
